resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107336</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107336</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206122</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Northeast Sustainable Energy Association (NESEA), K-12 Education</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stützbare Energie-Nordostverbindung (NESEA), 
Ausbildung K-12</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Association Soutenable du nord-est D'Énergie 
(NESEA), Éducation K-12</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Associação Sustainable Do nordeste Da Energia 
(NESEA), Instrução K-12</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Associazione Sostenibile Di nordest Di Energia 
(NESEA), Formazione K-12</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένωση βορειοανατολικής βιώσιμη ενέργειας (NESEA), 
εκπαίδευση Κ- 12</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Asociación Sostenible Nordestal De la Energía 
(NESEA), Educación K-12</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">offers instructional resources for learning about earth-friendly approaches to transportation, including lessons on model solar cars, electric cars, and travel solutions to global warming.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bietet anweisende Betriebsmittel für das Lernen 
über Masse-freundliche Annäherungen Transport, einschließlich 
Lektionen auf vorbildlichen Solarautos, elektrischen Autos und 
Spielraumlösungen dem globalen Wärmen an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">offre les ressources d'instruction pour se 
renseigner sur des approches terre-amicales au transport, y compris 
des leçons sur les voitures solaires modèles, aux voitures 
électriques, et aux solutions de voyage au chauffage global.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oferece recursos instrutivos para aprender sobre 
aproximações terra-amigáveis ao transporte, including lições nos 
carros solares modelo, aos carros elétricos, e às soluções do 
curso a aquecer-se global.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">offre le risorse didattiche per imparare circa i 
metodi terra-amichevoli a trasporto, compreso le lezioni sugli 
automobili solari di modello, agli automobili elettrici ed alle 
soluzioni di corsa al riscaldamento globale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσφέρει τα εκπαιδευτικά στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς για 
την εκμάθηση για τις γη-φιλικές προσεγγίσεις στη μεταφορά, 
συμπεριλαμβανομένων των μαθημάτων στα πρότυπα ηλιακά αυτοκίνητα, 
των ηλεκτρικών αυτοκινήτων, και των λύσεων ταξιδιού στην 
παγκόσμια αύξηση της θερμοκρασίας λόγω του φαινομένου του 
θερμοκηπίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece los recursos educacionales para aprender 
sobre acercamientos tierra-co'modos al transporte, incluyendo 
lecciones en los coches solares modelo, a los coches eléctricos, y a 
las soluciones del recorrido a calentarse global.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206122</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107336</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/northeast-sustainable-energy-association-nesea-k-12-education</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
